Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Megatron Revived:
 
The clone decended to greet the Predacon who stuck his head on the chopping block.
"I am as authentic as the idiots who took the name 'Megatron' as their own and they were defeated.  My spark is a creation of Vector Sigma, a near complete copy of the original Megatron, up until the year 2005, when Unicron created Galvatron.  But my memory goes back farther, before the Quintessons made Megaton the Tyrant that tried to destroy the Autobots.  I am here in search of family, but if any of you stand in my way-"
The four energy vulcans mounted in the helmet powered up and fired a burst at Perceptor's feet.
"You will be terminated."
He then ascended, and awaited any further response from these so- called decendants of the Decepticons.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Perceptor:

Perceptor reachaed the door, and looking to the pretended Megatron 
said "WHO ARE YOU THAT PRETEDN TO BE MEGATRON???"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> The Security Chief hovered in place.  No appearent activity.  He 
chuckled to himself, they were definanetly unorganized.  He wanted 
to see exactly who was down in that little bunker of a base, but the 
Matrix in his chest could not connect to Vector Sigma in this time.  
Could it?
> 'No, in this time Vector Sigma is still offline.  I won't be able 
connect and see who is here.'
> "I grow impatient!  Show me some spinal support columns!  Or are 
you just like the Quintessons, soft and weak?!"
> The fusion cannon slowly powered up, and Megatron Revived took 
aim.  He aimed at a rock formation two hundred yards from the base.
> "A thirty percent blast should grab their attention, heh heh heh."
> The cannon powered to thirty percent and the massive blast was 
issued forth.  The massive violet beam struck the formation and mere 
seconds later a tremendous explosion rocked the ground.  The tall 
dust cloud greeted the grinning clone, he never powered up the 
cannon to this extent.
> "Is there anyone home?  Or am I just wasting my time?"
> 
> MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/22/04 11:35:28 PM Central Daylight Time, 
airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> "It CAN'T BEE!!!!"Snarled Hydras while he took off the 
> microphone "I'M MEGATRON AND GALVATRON IN ONE!!!!! HOW COULD BE 
> THAT?????... MAXIMA!!!!! Took this helmet and use it... as well as 
> thjis gloves and microphone... you will control electronic-puppet 
ad 
> you will pretend to be me to deceive Lord Vykos other pred 
leader... 
> Find out my dear what doeas he pretends... WHIL I CRUSH THAT FALSE 
> BOT THAT PRETEND TO BE ME!!! "
> 
> 
> Grabbing his arm, "WAIT! Would not be wise!" pausing awaiting his 
reaction. 
> 
> "Allow me to go. Perhaps he is not aware of your presence & who 
you are. If he is who he claims.. he would recognise who I am." Her 
voice stern & as logical as possible. Hydras was playing a dangerous 
enough game with Vykos. Another challenger made it all the worse. 
> But she was bound & determined that the one in Leadership would be 
the one she trusted most.. the one was TRULY Megatron. & Hydras was 
he. 
> 
> Gazing up at Hydras with her crimson optics.. attempting to 
convince him. 
> 
> 
>
